name: docthis-nd
description: Automatically generates detailed NaturalDoc comments in TypeScript and JavaScript files.

docthisnd.includeTypes.description: When enabled, type information is added to comment tags.

docthisnd.includeMemberOfOnClassMembers.description: When enabled, memberOf information is added to comment tags on class members.

docthisnd.includeMemberOfOnInterfaceMemb.description: When enabled, memberOf information is added to comment tags on interface members.

docthisnd.includeDescriptionTag.description: When enabled, JSDoc comments for functions and methods will include @description.

docthisnd.enableHungarianNotationEvaluat.description: When enabled, hungarian notation will be used as a type hint.

docthisnd.inferTypesFromNames.description: When enabled, will use names of params & methods as type hints.

docthisnd.includeAuthorTag.description: When enabled, will add the @author tag.

docthisnd.authorName.default: (Set the text for this tag by adding docthis.authorName to your settings file.)
docthisnd.authorName.description: When docthis.includeAuthorTag is enabled, will add @author tag with this value.
